entities.name: zacharias
entities.description: Zacharias folded his arms and said nothing, though perhaps this was because he was too busy keeping an eye on the instrument in George’s hand.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: “Right,” said Hermione, looking relieved that something had at last been settled.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: “Hang on,” said Angelina, “we need to make sure this doesn’t clash with our Quidditch practice.”

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: “I’m sure we can find a night that suits everyone,” said Hermione,
